name: Circadian Rhythm Disruption Syndrome
chief_complaint: I can't sleep at night but I'm exhausted all day, and my mood is all over the place
prognosis: Good with consistent treatment, though prone to relapse during stressful periods
description: A disorder of the internal biological clock characterized by misalignment between sleep-wake cycles and environmental light-dark cycles, leading to significant impairment in daily functioning and emotional regulation. Often triggered by irregular work schedules or excessive screen time before bed.
